title: ★Condo Available In Rochester Hills★
posting_body: IF THIS PROPERTY DOESN'T FIT YOUR NEEDS, FEEL FREE TO CALL OR EMAIL ME

show contact info
2 Beds
2 Baths
1100 Square Ft

Best location in the sub – recently remodeled 1200 sft, 2 bedroom, 2 bath, 2 car garage ranch style condo with full basement; Surrounded by beautiful natural park view; Walking distance to shopping center, Lifetime and Edge Fitness; Close to downtown Rochester, Oakland University, Stony Creek Park; Quick access to Expressway; Friendly neighborhood and great place for professionals and young family with small children: Features include: - Newly upgraded kitchen with granite countertops and brand new smart appliances.
- New luxury vinyl flooring in all rooms.
- Freshly painted whole house.
- Master bedroom w/ walk-in closet & full bath.
- Relatively new furnace, hot water tank.
- Basement features a laundry room & plenty of storage.
- Outdoor living space including covered front porch and a private patio accessible from kitchen.
- Owner pays for trash, sewer, water, landscaping & snow removal.
Tenant only pays for electricity and gas.
2,800 security deposit, 1st month rent, $250 non-refundable prep cleaning fee, employer letter/2-pay stubs, credit report.
No pets.
No smoking.
Minimum 24-month lease.

The agent does not guarantee the accuracy of the square footage, lot size, or other information concerning the conditions or features of the property provided by the seller or obtained from public records or other sources.
The buyer is advised to independently verify the accuracy of all information through personal inspection and with appropriate professionals.
Presented by: Christopher Berna
